definition: (slang) sometimes used as a term of address for attractive young women
details:
noun
- (slang) sometimes used as a term of address for attractive young women
= synonyms: baby
- a female person who is a fellow member of a sorority or labor union or other group
= example: a female person who is a fellow member of a sorority or labor union or other group
- a female person who has the same parents as another person
= example: a female person who has the same parents as another person
= synonyms: sis
